channel.title: KrisMa again
channel.description: I was entering my house and then KrisMa kill me with a bucket of lava, i was with a diamons axe and an iron sword and he didn´t gave me back.Its the second time he grief me I report the time that he destroy my mushroom house. Here is the prin screen, u can chek the history of the server and see that i died trying to swim in lava. I live in Brasil and the time zone to EUA is -4 hours. U can see that he put a lava bucket too.

item.title: KrisMa again
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Talk to KrisMa and try and get your items back, if he doesn’t give them back then I’ll ban for a few days.

Read full topic
